content:
ICS 269, Spring 2006: Theory Seminar

The Theory Group meets Fridays at 1:00pm; this quarter we are in CS 243. Below is this quarter's schedule.

Apr 7: Organizational Meeting
Apr 14: holiday break
Apr 21: cancelled
Apr 28: John Augustine, Theoretical Models and Solutions for Problems in Computer Science
May 5: Dan Hirschberg, Improved Adaptive Group Testing Algorithms
May 12: Kevin Wortman, The Snowblower Problem
May 19: Jeremy Yu Meng, Conflict-Free Coloring of Shallow Discs
May 26: Josiah Carlson, The Maximum-Mean Subtree and other Bicriterion Subtree Problems
Jun 2: Nodari Sitchinava, Zero Knowledge with Efficient Provers
Jun 9: Matt Nguyen, The Santa Claus Problem

Previous quarters' theory seminars
